summary: Convert firewood to logs for use in hearthfire
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Mod description:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
This allows you to craft a sawn log from firewood at the tanning rack. There are two files one where a single log costs 10 firewood and one where the log costs 20 firewood.

The main reason I made this was because some craftable items  in hearthfire wouldn't necessarily require a big log in my opinion, so just think of it as you using the firewood in place of the logs. That and also I noticed sometimes my followers would sit around and chop wood all day accumulating a lot of firewood and it's pretty useless except for arrows.


[b][u][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Requirements:
[/size][/color][/u][/b]This requires the Hearthfire DLC
author: DimensionLord1
